ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Music》 characters get +500 power.

ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put a card from the bottom of your opponent's stock into his or her waiting room.

name: "Summer Uniform" Honoka Kosaka
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When?this?card?attacks, choose up to two of your 《Music》 characters, and those characters get +500 power until end of turn.

name: "Summer Uniform" Nozomi Tojo
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: It's a good idea to spray water around on hot days. It's cooled off a bit, how nice.

name: "Summer Uniform" Umi Sonoda
flavor_text: It feels great to work out with the radio first thing in the morning. Want to join me?

name: "Summer Uniform" Hanayo Koizumi
flavor_text: During summer you wear less, so you sweat the small stuff more…… Do you eat fewer snacks, too?

name: "Summer Uniform" Eli Ayase
ability: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【STAND】)

name: “Lovely Marine Girl” Kotori Minami
ability: 【AUTO】[(1)] When?this?card?attacks, if a card named "Shout Out to You" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: “Fruit of Summer☆” Nozomi Tojo
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the number of your other 《Music》 characters is two or more, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Isn't it fun to look at everyone from the poolside? I almost want to ask what you're looking at.

name: “Queen of the Shore” Hanayo Koizumi
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Music》 characters in front of this card get +1 level and +500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Music》 character, put it into your hand, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (If it is not, return the revealed card to its original place)
flavor_text: I really like it when you get in the water and your body starts to float.

name: “Summer Uniform” Rin Hoshizora
flavor_text: I have so much energy in the summer! Maybe my dancing can chase away the summer heat.

name: “Today is Umi's Day??”Umi Sonoda
ability: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Music》 character, choose one of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. (The revealed card is returned to its original place)

【ACT】COUNTER@ Backup 2500, level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn.)
flavor_text: I think that school swimsuits are OK, even if I look like a student…… What do you think?

name: “Bewitching Mermaid” Eli Ayase
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Music》 characters get +1000 power.
【ACT】[(1) 【STAND】 this card] Choose one of your 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: I'm pretty confident in my swimming abilities♪ Do you think my long legs make me better?

name: “Singing by the Shore” Maki Nishikino
ability: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【STAND】)
【ACT】[【STAND】 two of your 《Music》 characters] This card gets +2500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: The big fireworks displays are nice, but I also like sparklers. So cute!

name: “Summer Sunset Girl” Rin Hoshizora
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Music》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets +1000 power.
flavor_text: Come on, come on! This is a serious competition. Who's the fastest swimmer?

name: “Summer Uniform” Nico Yazawa
flavor_text: So hot…… Would you be a sunshade for me?

name: “Sun on the Seashore” Honoka Kosaka
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Music》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

ability: Search your deck for up to one 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.

ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. ( : During this turn, when the next damage dealt by the attacking character that triggered this card is canceled, deal one damage to your opponent.)
(【SHOT】: During this turn, when the next damage dealt by the attacking character that triggered this card is canceled, deal 1 damage to your opponent)

name: Winning Smile
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. ( : When this card triggers, you may choose one of your opponent's characters, and return it to your opponent's hand.)
(【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)
